title: Information Broker Registry
author: Market Administrator
content:
Updated registry of authorized information brokers operating within The Black Circuit:

- Zanis Kell (License #K-5567) - Specializations: Corporate surveillance, Starship manifests
- Kira Veld (License #V-2239) - Specializations: Political intel, Faction movements
- Vaelus Korr (License #K-8814) - Specializations: Blackmarket auctions, Weapons shipments

REMINDER: All transactions must include the standard 15% market fee. Unlicensed brokers will be reported to Syndicate security immediately.

title: Client Blacklist - CONFIDENTIAL
author: Market Security
content:
The following individuals are banned from all Black Circuit services due to payment disputes, information theft, or violence against brokers:

- Captain Harrick Thorne - Attempted to steal data wafers from Broker Kell
- Selene Maddox - Failed to pay for critical intel leading to Broker Norris's death
- Jaxon Vil (Red Claw operative) - Threatened brokers for free information

NOTE: If spotted, alert security immediately. Rax Vennik has personally authorized lethal force against repeat offenders.

title: Upcoming Auction Alert
author: Vaelus Korr
content:
NOTICE TO ALL PREMIUM CLIENTS:

Rax Vennik's Syndicate will be hosting a specialized auction in 12 days at the Warehouse Complex. Items include recovered starships, experimental tech, and other high-value acquisitions. The centerpiece is a modified Type-S Scout/Courier with unspecified modifications of interest to several research corporations.

Known interested parties include representatives from House Azura, Lysani Labs, and possibly Black Talon operatives.

Bidding credentials available through usual channels. 25,000 credit minimum verification required.

title: Intercepted FUW Communications
author: Unknown
content:
Encrypted communications between suspected FUW cells indicate planned disruption of shipments to Lysani Laboratories within the next week. Specific targets unknown, but chatter mentions the 'Vennik Auction' as a secondary objective. Strike Core elements appear to be mobilizing in Old Caldonis.

Unknown FUW operative designated 'Torren' mentioned repeatedly. Possible high-value target.

This information is available for 15,000 credits to interested parties.

title: Vennik Syndicate - Internal Rivalries
author: Kira Veld
content:
PREMIUM INTELLIGENCE BRIEF - NOT FOR CIRCULATION

Tension within Vennik's inner circle has escalated. Gareth Vane (Finance) is suspected of skimming from auction proceeds, while Rax's enforcer Sayelle has reportedly threatened Vane directly.

RECOMMENDATION: Approach either faction with extreme caution. Leverage available if needed, but substantial risk exists regardless of alignment choice.

Full dossiers available for 12,000 credits each.
